General.Name: Zhejiang Yongtai Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Yongtai Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of fluorinate chemicals in China. It also sells pesticides, etc. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Linhai, China.
General.Address: No. 1 Donghai Fifth Avenue, Linhai, China, 317016
